mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PATIENT WHERE P_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p_name}),'%')
SELECT W.*, COUNT(A.WARD_CODE) CUR_CAPACITY FROM ADMISSION A RIGHT JOIN WARD W ON(W.WARD_CODE = A.WARD_CODE) GROUP BY A.WARD_CODE, W.WARD_CODE, W.CAPACITY ORDER BY W.WARD_CODE
SELECT W.*, W.CAPACITY-COUNT(A.WARD_CODE) AVAILABLE_CAPACITY FROM ADMISSION A RIGHT JOIN WARD W ON(W.WARD_CODE = A.WARD_CODE) GROUP BY A.WARD_CODE, W.WARD_CODE, W.CAPACITY ORDER BY W.WARD_CODE
SELECT P.*, A.ADMISSION_DATE FROM PATIENT P JOIN ADMISSION A ON(P.P_NO = A.P_NO) WHERE A.WARD_CODE = #{ward_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PATIENT VALUES ( SEQ_P_NO.NEXTVAL, #{p_name}, #{p_age}, #{p_gender}, #{p_address}, #{p_phone, typeHandler=strArrPhoneTypeHandler}, #{p_rrn},SYSDATE, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE PATIENT SET P_LASTDATE = SYSDATE, P_ACC_YN = 'Y' WHERE P_NO=#{p_no}

UPDATE PATIENT SET P_NAME = #{p_name}, P_AGE = #{p_age}, P_GENDER = #{p_gender}, P_ADDRESS = #{p_address}, P_PHONE = #{p_phone, typeHandler=strArrPhoneTypeHandler}, P_RRN = #{p_rrn} WHERE P_NO = #{p_no}
